entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
